name: Hue Jumper
description:
𝑯𝒖𝒆 𝑱𝒖𝒎𝒑𝒆𝒓 Mouse = Steer     Click = Brake     Double Click = Jump     R = Restart Reach checkpoints to get more time.     The road ends at 1000.

This entire game is a single html file, under 2k when zipped, made for 2kPlus Jam. I will post the full source code to GitHub after I have time to clean it up. This embedded version is enhanced for itch with touch support. You can download the 2k zip below. I will add sound effects, music, high score saving, and gamepad support to the enhanced version soon!

Features

Retro style 3D rendering engine in full HD

Realistic driving physics and collisions

Random level generation with increasing difficulty

Scenic views of sky, sun, moon, mountains, trees and rocks

Slow down and camera rumble when off road

Checkpoint system with hue shifting

Time and distance display
